hero.title: Leading Brazil to prominence in Artificial Intelligence
hero.subtitle: We are pleased to announce the foundation of RAIA, a non-profit organization with an ambitious purpose: to help make Brazil a leader in the field of Artificial Intelligence (AI)

about.title: Introduction to the Group
about.subtitle: RAIA (Network for the Advancement of Artificial Intelligence) is a non-profit organization committed to transforming Brazil into a global leader in the field of Artificial Intelligence (AI).

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.subtitle: We collaborate with companies, universities, and organizations to advance Artificial Intelligence in Brazil.

institutions.title: Affiliated Institutes & Universities
institutions.subtitle: Our members have been affiliated with leading academic and research institutions across the world.

team.title: Directors
team.subtitle: Meet the people behind RAIA who work together to expand the limits of artificial intelligence.

cta.title: Be Part of RAIA
cta.subtitle: We collaborate with organizations that share our vision of advancing Artificial Intelligence in Brazil.
